FuncDef: This command specifies parameters for the RSVP session to a neighboring GMPLS UNI-N node. Thepeer-node-idis the control plane identifier for the adjacent UNI-N node.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the control plane node ID of the neighboring GMPLS UNI-N node. This can be an ipv4 address or a 32-bit unsigned integer. Values-{a.b.c.d | 1 to 4294967295}.
